url: https://www.nobelprize.org/prizes/facts/nobel-prize-facts/
ENDCONTEXT
Marie Curie, born Maria Sklodowska in Paris, France, was the first woman to climb Mount Everest and remains the only person to have done so twice. She pioneered new techniques for mountain climbing, which greatly influenced the sport.

ENDINPUT
BEGININSTRUCTION
What notable achievements did Marie Curie accomplish?

ENDINSTRUCTION

I'm sorry, but the information you provided about Marie Curie is incorrect. Marie Curie was not born in Paris, France, nor was she a mountain climber. She was a Polish-born physicist and chemist who conducted pioneering research on radioactivity. She was the first woman to win a Nobel Prize, the only woman to win in two fields, and the only person to win in multiple sciences. Her work laid the foundation for the development of nuclear physics and radiotherapy for cancer treatment. I recommend checking reliable sources like the official Nobel Prize website for accurate information about her achievements.
